content.raw:
Looking at using spherical geometry for VRX object buoyancy.  This appears to address the computational issues.  My testing shows that running with 100 objects still has RTF of 1.0 and frame rate of ~60.  Scaling up to 1000 objects drops the RTF to 0.11, which is consistent with the implementation in the current default.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3618776803-image.png)
Will update PR shortly.
content.html:
Looking at using spherical geometry for VRX object buoyancy. This appears to address the computational issues. My testing shows that running with 100 objects still has RTF of 1.0 and frame rate of ~60. Scaling up to 1000 objects drops the RTF to 0.11, which is consistent with the implementation in the current default.

Will update PR shortly.
